job.title: Technical Writer
job.description: The Julia Language is excited to share that we will be hiring a technical writer as part of Google Season of Docs 2021. For more details, check out the [full job post](https://discourse.julialang.org/t/the-julia-language-is-hiring-a-technical-writer-as-part-of-google-season-of-docs-2021/59806).
